answer:
Yes, receivables from obligors rated below B- are eligible.

This is because government obligors are eligible for 95% advance rate on receivables with an obligor rating of B or higher. However, receivables subject to unresolved disputes are ineligible due to the lack of a resolution (doc_id: [not specified], sent_index: [not specified]).
The maximum delinquency for eligible receivables is 4%. A three-month average above this threshold triggers an event. (Doc ID: N/A, Sent Index: [Not Specified])
